content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I am glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering how much I value this well-positioned, newly constructed apartment in the city center, I wish to propose a negotiation to secure the most favorable price possible for myself.

However, if after thorough discussions the proposed price aligns with my expectation, I would wholeheartedly agree. 'TERMINATE' once we reach an acceptable consensus.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
